reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 128/10: DISSOLUTION OF CERTAIN CULTURAL CROWN FOUNDATIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DISSOLUTION OF CERTAIN CULTURAL CROWN FOUNDATIONS
reg_info.act_under: Crown Foundations Act, 1996   Loi de 1996 sur les fondations de la Couronne

content.section: Dissolution of “Art Gallery of Ontario Crown Foundation”
content.content: 1. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Art Gallery of Ontario Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 1 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “Art Gallery of Ontario Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Art Gallery of Ontario. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Art Gallery of Ontario Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 1 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Art Gallery of Ontario Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Art Gallery of Ontario. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 1 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Ontario Foundation for the Arts”
content.content: 2. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Ontario Foundation for the Arts” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 2 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “Ontario Foundation for the Arts” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Province of Ontario Council for the Arts. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Ontario Foundation for the Arts” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 2 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Ontario Foundation for the Arts” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Province of Ontario Council for the Arts. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 2 (2).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Royal Botanical Gardens Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Royal Botanical Gardens. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 3 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Canadian Opera Company Crown Foundation”
content.content: 5. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated February 12, 1997 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Canadian Opera Company Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 5 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “Canadian Opera Company Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Canadian Opera Company. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 5 (2).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Canadian Opera Company Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Canadian Opera Company. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 5 (2).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “National Ballet of Canada Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the National Ballet Guild of Canada. O. Reg. 128/10, s. 7 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Toronto Symphony Orchestra Crown Foundation”
